title: Michael Irvin on Radio Row at Super Bowl 60
description: Michael Irvin, Super Bowl winner and NFL hall of famer, talks to Bloomberg's Vanessa Perdomo at radio row in San Francisco before Super Bowl 60. (Source: Bloomberg)
